texts: PERT Maker is being updated to the latest version.
PERT Maker allows you to create PERT graphs with ease.
You can generate the critical path and the min and max times automatically.
You only have a table ? You can import it directly into PERT Maker !
You can choose how often PERT Maker checks for updates in the settings.

downloadFailed.title: Download Failed
downloadFailed.text: An error occurred while downloading the update.

installFailed.title: Install Failed
installFailed.text: An error occurred while installing the update.

openAppFailed.title: Open App Failed
openAppFailed.text: An error occurred while opening the app.
